remarks: Univariate polynomial evaluation maps (additive) group sums to group sums.  (Contributed by AV, 14-Sep-2019.)
statement:
evls1gsumadd.q $e |- Q = ( S evalSub1 R ) $.
evls1gsumadd.k $e |- K = ( Base ` S ) $.
evls1gsumadd.w $e |- W = ( Poly1 ` U ) $.
evls1gsumadd.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
evls1gsumadd.u $e |- U = ( S |`s R ) $.
evls1gsumadd.p $e |- P = ( S ^s K ) $.
evls1gsumadd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` W ) $.
evls1gsumadd.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. CRing ) $.
evls1gsumadd.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) $.
evls1gsumadd.y $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. N ) -> Y e. B ) $.
evls1gsumadd.n $e |- ( ph -> N C_ NN0 ) $.
evls1gsumadd.f $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. N |-> Y ) finSupp .0. ) $.
evls1gsumadd $p |- ( ph -> ( Q ` ( W gsum ( x e. N |-> Y ) ) ) = ( P gsum ( x e. N |-> ( Q ` Y ) ) ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d N x $.
$d Q x $.
$d ph x $.
